job_details.degree_required: Bachelor’s degree with an IT-related major or minor; OR Associate’s degree with an IT-related major or minor two years of experience in the IT area.

jd: From: Girija, Source InfoTech girija@sourceinfotech.com Reply to: girija@sourceinfotech.com Client: AOPCRole: Jr SQl DBALocation: Mechanicsburg, Pennsylvania(Candidates needs to be in 50 miles radius)Visa: GC/USCMOI: VideoDuration: 6+ month c2h**************Please share the resume with LinkedIn and Visa**************Job DutiesMonitors helpdesk ticket queues and prioritizes tasks based on severity and priority levels.Performs lookup value and metadata entry and maintenance to support the application.Understands company Administration screens and uses the application where appropriate.Performs user security change requests using in-house tools and template T-SQL scripts.Utilizes knowledge of T-SQL to perform application metadata and security maintenance activities.Develops and implements data scripts using IDERA Rapid SQL for SAP ASE databases.Performs testing of lookup values, metadata modifications, and application security for quality assurance.Performs metadata analysis to ensure the case management systems function properly.Assists with maintaining procedural documentation for the metadata administration and application security tasks.Assists team members and training staff with the collection and implementation of metadata. Minimum QualificationsKnowledge and understanding of T-SQL fundamentals.Bachelor’s degree with an IT-related major or minor; OR Associate’s degree with an IT-related major or minor two years of experience in the IT area.
